posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
Looking for one of each to complete a T206 back type collection. Low grade examples are fine.

Posted By: Hank
Brian,

I have several Drums with trimmed top border BUT the Drum printing on the reverse is striking & bold. Let me know if you are interested or you wish to see scans.

Hank
